events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection, requesting claim initiation.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of a personal vehicle in the collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer with the accident case.
Acknowledgement received confirming that the claim registration for the vehicle collision is successful.
Request sent to the insured for police report, photos of the damaged car, and repair estimates.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including police report and mechanic repair bill.
Investigation team began review of the claim to verify details of the accident and extent of the damage.
Investigation confirmed fault and verified damages in line with documents and statements provided.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental vehicle expenses was proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and requested faster payment processing.
The claim was approved officially based on investigation findings and submitted documentation.
Payment to cover approved repair costs was issued directly to the customer's designated bank account.
The insurance claim was formally closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
